title: What is Google's policy for providing a loaner phone during the repair of an under warranty device?
content:
I am based in India, and Google is giving me a really hard time with respect to providing a loaner device while my device is in repair process. 
The response time and answer to queries over emails and over phone is poor to say the least. 
I have communicated the issue more than a week ago and they have not even picked up the device for repair till now. 
This is not what I expected when I bought their flagship phone.
